title: Seduce the Scholar - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Fox Spirits   Lovers Reunited   R-18   R*pe
author: 모조
description:
It’s a harsh world for foxes to live in, so they have to become human.

She was my mother who died after saying that.

I have to become a human as my mother said…

“I have to seduce a man and swallow him.”

Although I tried to seduce most men, they didn’t appeal to me.

“Scholar. Can I borrow a blanket over there?”

A blunt scholar who suddenly met in the middle of the mountain entered Yeon-hee’s heart.

“Be prepared, because today I will send you to paradise.”

The man’s ears turned red at Yeon-hee's bold statement.>
